thread.title: George W. Bush Will Attend Trump’s Inauguration
thread.title_full: George W. Bush Will Attend Trump’s Inauguration

author: Saagar Enjeti
title: George W. Bush Will Attend Trump’s Inauguration

persons.name: george w. bush will attend trump

text:
TOP President George W. Bush holds his dog Barney and salutes while departing Air Force One at TSTC in Waco, Texas before spending a week at his Central Texas ranch in Crawford December 26, 2006. REUTERS/Larry Downing 5403766 
Former President George W. Bush indicated to reporters Tuesday he will attend President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration Jan. 20, The Dallas Morning News reports. 
Bush’s wife, former first lady Laura Bush, will also be in attendance. Bush’s spokesman told reporters, “They are pleased to be able to witness the peaceful transfer of power — a hallmark of American democracy — and swearing-in of President Trump and Vice President Pence.” 
Bush’s father, former President HW Bush previously said he will not attend due to health reasons. Neither former Presidents reportedly cast their vote for Trump.
